title: Themes Nesting Issue in Library Explorer
description: Themes nest in other library. Details: Themes are nesting in other libraries.
OB: When I open Library A in the library explorer and attempt to drag and drop themes from Library B into the layout, an error message pops up, indicating that the library namespace 'B' already exists.
EB: I expect the themes from Library B to be successfully added to Library A without any error messages or namespace conflicts.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open Library A in the library explorer.
2. Attempt to drag and drop themes from Library B into the layout of Library A.
